title: You Can't Handle the Woo: Jordan Peterson vs. Sam Harris
description:
So what really separates these two? Sam Harris is annoyed that Jordan Peterson is slipping woo-woo under his mythological carpet. 

Naturalist-materialism is the reigning paradigm but its days appear numbered. Thomas Nagel asks how mind can be re-introduced into our model of the physical world. The religion of the sacred self is already trying. 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
